item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260114.3)
item.description:
What's New

Add keystroke protection window to prevent buffer reset on focus refinement

  • Add lastKeystrokeTime tracking in KeyboardEventHandler to record when

the last keystroke was processed

  • Add isWithinKeystrokeProtectionWindow() method to check if within 150ms

protection window

  • Add keystroke protection checks in AppDelegate for both keyboard timer

and AXObserver focus change paths

  • If focus changes within 150ms of a keystroke, preserve engine buffer

instead of resetting (likely app-initiated focus refinement, not user click)

Fixes: Typing 'bajn' instead of 'bạn' in VSCode Copilot Chat where focus

switches from AXWindow to AXTextArea immediately after user starts typing,

previously causing buffer to reset mid-word.

Bump build version to 20260114.3
